Closet.name: Closet
Closet.desc: This isn't a very large or clean closet.

door.desc: The door leads back into the room.
door.inspect: The door is plain and wooden.

Small Cave.name: Small Cave
Small Cave.desc: This isn't a very large or clean closet.

s.desc: The opening of the cave leads back into the circle room.
s.inspect: The edges of the opening are cracked and rough.

old man.name: old man
old man.desc: An old man stoically stands at the back of the gave.

Weapon.name: iron sword
Weapon.desc: There is an iron sword on the ground.
Weapon.inspect: The iron sword is of crude workmanship, but it should be usable.

Circle Room.name: Circle Room
Circle Room.desc: You stand in a circular room crafted in stone.

door.desc: There is a door on one side.
door.inspect: The door is plain and wooden.

n.desc: There is a mouth of a cave to the north.
n.inspect: The cave opening glows with a soft flickering light.

s.desc: There is a hallway to the south.
s.inspect: The hallway seems narrow and foreboding.

e.desc: There is a pathway to the east.

Armor.name: leather armor
Armor.desc: There is a set of leather armor lying in a heap.
Armor.inspect: The armor is worn but light and sturdy.

Thing.name: leaf
Thing.desc: A leaf lies on the ground.

Next Room.name: Next Room
Next Room.desc: You are in the next room over.

w.desc: There is a pathway to the west.
w.inspect: The path expands into a larger room.

Long Hallway.name: Long Hallway
Long Hallway.desc: You are in a long, dark hallway.

n.desc: There is a room to the north.
n.inspect: The hallway seems narrow and foreboding.

Container.name: capsule
Container.inspect: The capsule appears to be able to hold things.

Thing.name: curious object
Thing.desc: There is a curious object here.
Thing.inspect: The object's appearance confuses your weak mind.
